name: jeni
author: SJC Hackathon 2017
description: A chat bot for jenius project in hackathon competition.

scripts.create: rm -rf claudia.json && yarn transpile && claudia create --region ap-southeast-1 --api-module bin/bot --timeout 120 --allow-recursion --configure-fb-bot --name jenibot
scripts.aws:refresh: aws iam delete-role-policy --role-name jenibot-executor --policy-name log-writer && aws iam delete-role-policy --role-name jenibot-executor --policy-name recursive-execution && aws iam delete-role --role-name jenibot-executor
